title: Bitcoin bulls nudge at $70K as BTC price sees 'not typical' weekend
description:
Bitcoin is "well positioned" for a strong weekly close, but not everyone is trusting of traditionally unreliable weekend BTC price action.

Bitcoin (BTC) headed higher into the April 7 weekly close as uncharacteristic weekend BTC price action boosted bulls.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView showed a sudden move above $69,000 during the weekend, with Bitcoin hitting local highs of $69,781 on Bitstamp.

With the close now just hours away, traders evoked similar weekend scenarios, hoping that upside would continue into the new week.

Read more

title: Can Bitcoin (BTC) Reach $80,000 Pre Halving? Trade BTC Among Other Major Cryptos on Pullix's (PLX) New Hybrid Platform
description: The rise in Bitcoin's value since the start of 2024 has been monumental. This has led to investors harboring the possibility of Bitcoin reaching the $80,000 price mark. This article analyzes the feasibility of the top crypto coin reaching such a lofty milestone.

title: Altcoin Sherpa Projects Major Upswing for DOGE – Traders Top Meme Coins Picks for Q1 BONK and KANG
description: Dogecoin (DOGE) has remained bullish on the charts even despite the broader market correction phase and is seen as one of the hottest memecoins as a result of this, appealing to major crypto analyst ALtcoin Sherpa. Alongside it, Bonk (BONK) is also seeing bullish on-chart metrics after climbing over 3,500% year-to-date (YTD).

title: April Gainers: Top DeFi Coins With Potential For a Significant Pump This Week
description: This week is quite significant in the crypto market as it marks the beginning of the second quarter and the month of Bitcoin’s halving. Without doubt, this week is bound to feature the pumping of some crypto coins both in the DeFi market, P2E, NFT and all other sectors.
